attributes.action: Exile Lester James Drake (of Basingstoke) from Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I speak for many people when I say "Lester Drake must go."  For those who do not know Lester Drake I can assure you that this is the correct course of action.  His arrogance and belligerence make him the greatest threat to Britains stability at this time.  Our only realistic option is to exile him, should we hesitate our country will be forfiet.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
